page.title: 11ASH SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: Our school building is 21 years old & has 150 children.We have four full-time teachers and a half-time teacher,a Head master,Mr Potter,and a secretary.We have three dinner ladies,the ladies who cook the lunch & a care-taker/cleaner. We have a big hall for dinners,plays, assemblies and P.E. with wallbars,ropes and other PE equipment.We have 5 class- rooms and a library, an adventure field with a slide, high bars,tunnels and a spiders web.We also have two playing fields & a playground & garden.We play rounders,cricket,football and netball We have two RML 480Z computers. Every year we have Harvest Festival, Christmas plays & parties,decorated Eas ter egg & flower arranging competitions Sports Day & Fete.There are class trips every term for topic work & Class 5 had a 3-day trip to France in June.We raise money for charity with sponsored events
